synopsis.text: Together with her friends, high school student Shiokaze Umino is recruited to join the Nakano Naval Academy's special school for girls, known as the 'Virgin Fleet'. In the wake of World War II, Japan is on the brink of another war with Russia, and the Virgin Fleet is their last hope. These girls possess a unique form of energy known as 'Virgin Energy', which allows them to control fighter planes and protect Japan from imminent destruction. Shiokaze, along with her friends Satsuki and Komachi, must learn to harness their powers while trying to maintain a normal school life. With the future of Japan resting on their shoulders, these young women must navigate the challenges of adolescence and war, all while keeping their purity intact. Can Shiokaze and her friends master their powers in time to save Japan from destruction? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
